title: IExplodeStep.AutoSpaceComponentsOnDrag
description: Gets or sets whether to automatically space a group of components equally along an axis as you drag them.
returns: True to automatically space components equally along an axis as you drag them, false to not (see Remarks )
remarks:
If this property is set to true, then, by default,
IExplodeStep::RotateAboutEachComponentOrigin
is false and
IExplodeStep::RotationAngle
is 0.0.
If you set this property to false during editing of this step, then you must re-set the values for IExplodeStep::RotateAboutEachComponentOrigin and IExplodeStep::RotationAngle.
